class.name: PCKPacker
class.brief_description: Creates packages that can be loaded into a running project.

method.name: add_file
method.description: Adds the [param source_path] file to the current PCK package at the [param pck_path] internal path (should start with [code]res://[/code]).

method.name: flush
method.description: Writes the files specified using all [method add_file] calls since the last flush. If [param verbose] is [code]true[/code], a list of files added will be printed to the console for easier debugging.

method.name: pck_start
method.description: Creates a new PCK file with the name [param pck_name]. The [code].pck[/code] file extension isn't added automatically, so it should be part of [param pck_name] (even though it's not required).
